001package com.technototes.path.subsystem;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.control.PIDCoefficients;
005import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive.DriveSignal;
006import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive.TankDrive;
007import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers.TankPIDVAFollower;
008import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers.TrajectoryFollower;
009import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.geometry.Pose2d;
010import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.localization.Localizer;
011import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.Trajectory;
012import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.TrajectoryBuilder;
013import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.AngularVelocityConstraint;
014import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.MinVelocityConstraint;
015import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.ProfileAccelerationConstraint;
016import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.TankVelocityConstraint;
017import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.TrajectoryAccelerationConstraint;
018import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.TrajectoryVelocityConstraint;
019import com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxModule;
020import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor;
021import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorEx;
022import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.PIDFCoefficients;
023import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.VoltageSensor;
024import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.configuration.typecontainers.MotorConfigurationType;
025import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice;
026import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.EncodedMotorGroup;
027import com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.IMU;
028import com.technototes.library.subsystem.Subsystem;
029import com.technototes.path.subsystem.TankConstants.*;
030import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.TrajectorySequence;
031import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.TrajectorySequenceBuilder;
032import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.TrajectorySequenceRunner;
033import com.technototes.path.util.LynxModuleUtil;
034import java.util.ArrayList;
035import java.util.Arrays;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.stream.Collectors;
038
039public class TankDrivebaseSubsystem extends TankDrive implements Subsystem {
040
041    public final double TICKS_PER_REV, MAX_RPM;
042
043    public final boolean RUN_USING_ENCODER;
044
045    public final PIDFCoefficients MOTOR_VELO_PID;
046
047    public final double WHEEL_RADIUS, GEAR_RATIO, TRACK_WIDTH, kV, kA, kStatic;
048    public final double MAX_VEL, MAX_ACCEL, MAX_ANG_VEL, MAX_ANG_ACCEL;
049    public final PIDCoefficients AXIAL_PID, CROSS_TRACK_PID, HEADING_PID;
050    public final double LATERAL_MULTIPLIER, VX_WEIGHT, OMEGA_WEIGHT;
051
052    public final int POSE_HISTORY_LIMIT;
053
054    private TrajectorySequenceRunner trajectorySequenceRunner;
055
056    private final TrajectoryVelocityConstraint VEL_CONSTRAINT;
057
058    private final TrajectoryAccelerationConstraint ACCEL_CONSTRAINT;
059
060    private TrajectoryFollower follower;
061
062    private List<DcMotorEx> motors, leftMotors, rightMotors;
063    private IMU imu;
064
065    private VoltageSensor batteryVoltageSensor;
066
067    public TankDrivebaseSubsystem(
068        EncodedMotorGroup<DcMotorEx> left,
069        EncodedMotorGroup<DcMotorEx> right,
070        IMU i,
071        TankConstants c,
072        Localizer localizer
073    ) {
074        super(
075            c.getDouble(KV.class),
076            c.getDouble(KA.class),
077            c.getDouble(KStatic.class),
078            c.getDouble(TrackWidth.class)
079        );
080        TICKS_PER_REV = c.getDouble(TicksPerRev.class);
081        MAX_RPM = c.getDouble(MaxRPM.class);
082
083        RUN_USING_ENCODER = c.getBoolean(UseDriveEncoder.class);
084
085        MOTOR_VELO_PID = c.getPIDF(MotorVeloPID.class);
086
087        WHEEL_RADIUS = c.getDouble(WheelRadius.class);
088        GEAR_RATIO = c.getDouble(GearRatio.class);
089        TRACK_WIDTH = c.getDouble(TrackWidth.class);
090        kV = c.getDouble(KV.class);
091        kA = c.getDouble(KA.class);
092        kStatic = c.getDouble(KStatic.class);
093
094        MAX_VEL = c.getDouble(MaxVelo.class);
095        MAX_ACCEL = c.getDouble(MaxAccel.class);
096        MAX_ANG_VEL = c.getDouble(MaxAngleVelo.class);
097        MAX_ANG_ACCEL = c.getDouble(MaxAngleAccel.class);
098
099        HEADING_PID = c.getPID(HeadPID.class);
100        AXIAL_PID = c.getPID(AxialPID.class);
101        CROSS_TRACK_PID = c.getPID(CrossPID.class);
102
103        LATERAL_MULTIPLIER = c.getDouble(LateralMult.class);
104        VX_WEIGHT = c.getDouble(VXWeight.class);
105        OMEGA_WEIGHT = c.getDouble(OmegaWeight.class);
106
107        POSE_HISTORY_LIMIT = c.getInt(PoseLimit.class);
108
109        follower =
110            new TankPIDVAFollower(
111                AXIAL_PID,
112                CROSS_TRACK_PID,
113                new Pose2d(0.5, 0.5, Math.toRadians(5.0)),
114                0.5
115            );
116
117        VEL_CONSTRAINT = getVelocityConstraint(MAX_VEL, MAX_ANG_VEL, TRACK_WIDTH);
118        ACCEL_CONSTRAINT = getAccelerationConstraint(MAX_ACCEL);
119
120        LynxModuleUtil.ensureMinimumFirmwareVersion(HardwareDevice.hardwareMap);
121
122        batteryVoltageSensor = HardwareDevice.hardwareMap.voltageSensor.iterator().next();
123
124        for (LynxModule module : HardwareDevice.hardwareMap.getAll(LynxModule.class)) {
125            module.setBulkCachingMode(LynxModule.BulkCachingMode.AUTO);
126        }
127
128        // TODO: adjust the names of the following hardware devices to match your configuration
129        imu = i.radians().initialize();
130
131        // TODO: if your hub is mounted vertically, remap the IMU axes so that the z-axis points
132        // upward (normal to the floor) using a command like the following:
133        // BNO055IMUUtil.remapAxes(imu, AxesOrder.XYZ, AxesSigns.NPN);
134
135        // add/remove motors depending on your robot (e.g., 6WD)
136
137        motors = new ArrayList<>();
138        leftMotors =
139            left
140                .getAllDeviceList()
141                .stream()
142                .map(HardwareDevice::getDevice)
143                .collect(Collectors.toList());
144        rightMotors =
145            right
146                .getAllDeviceList()
147                .stream()
148                .map(HardwareDevice::getDevice)
149                .collect(Collectors.toList());
150        motors.addAll(leftMotors);
151        motors.addAll(rightMotors);
152
153        for (DcMotorEx motor : motors) {
154            MotorConfigurationType motorConfigurationType = motor.getMotorType().clone();
155            motorConfigurationType.setAchieveableMaxRPMFraction(1.0);
156            motor.setMotorType(motorConfigurationType);
157        }
158
159        if (c.getBoolean(TankConstants.UseDriveEncoder.class)) {
160            setMode(DcMotor.RunMode.RUN_USING_ENCODER);
161        }
162
163        setZeroPowerBehavior(DcMotor.ZeroPowerBehavior.BRAKE);
164
165        if (RUN_USING_ENCODER && MOTOR_VELO_PID != null) {
166            setPIDFCoefficients(DcMotor.RunMode.RUN_USING_ENCODER, MOTOR_VELO_PID);
167        }
168
169        // TODO: reverse any motors using DcMotor.setDirection()
170
171        // TODO: if desired, use setLocalizer() to change the localization method
172        // for instance, setLocalizer(new ThreeTrackingWheelLocalizer(...));
173
174        trajectorySequenceRunner = new TrajectorySequenceRunner(follower, HEADING_PID);
175    }
176
177    public TrajectoryBuilder trajectoryBuilder(Pose2d startPose) {
178        return new TrajectoryBuilder(startPose, VEL_CONSTRAINT, ACCEL_CONSTRAINT);
179    }
180
181    public TrajectoryBuilder trajectoryBuilder(Pose2d startPose, boolean reversed) {
182        return new TrajectoryBuilder(startPose, reversed, VEL_CONSTRAINT, ACCEL_CONSTRAINT);
183    }
184
185    public TrajectoryBuilder trajectoryBuilder(Pose2d startPose, double startHeading) {
186        return new TrajectoryBuilder(startPose, startHeading, VEL_CONSTRAINT, ACCEL_CONSTRAINT);
187    }
188
189    public TrajectorySequenceBuilder trajectorySequenceBuilder(Pose2d startPose) {
190        return new TrajectorySequenceBuilder(
191            startPose,
192            VEL_CONSTRAINT,
193            ACCEL_CONSTRAINT,
194            MAX_ANG_VEL,
195            MAX_ANG_ACCEL
196        );
197    }
198
199    public void turnAsync(double angle) {
200        trajectorySequenceRunner.followTrajectorySequenceAsync(
201            trajectorySequenceBuilder(getPoseEstimate()).turn(angle).build()
202        );
203    }
204
205    public void turn(double angle) {
206        turnAsync(angle);
207        waitForIdle();
208    }
209
210    public void followTrajectoryAsync(Trajectory trajectory) {
211        trajectorySequenceRunner.followTrajectorySequenceAsync(
212            trajectorySequenceBuilder(trajectory.start()).addTrajectory(trajectory).build()
213        );
214    }
215
216    public void followTrajectory(Trajectory trajectory) {
217        followTrajectoryAsync(trajectory);
218        waitForIdle();
219    }
220
221    public void followTrajectorySequenceAsync(TrajectorySequence trajectorySequence) {
222        trajectorySequenceRunner.followTrajectorySequenceAsync(trajectorySequence);
223    }
224
225    public void followTrajectorySequence(TrajectorySequence trajectorySequence) {
226        followTrajectorySequenceAsync(trajectorySequence);
227        waitForIdle();
228    }
229
230    public Pose2d getLastError() {
231        return trajectorySequenceRunner.getLastPoseError();
232    }
233
234    public void update() {
235        updatePoseEstimate();
236        DriveSignal signal = trajectorySequenceRunner.update(getPoseEstimate(), getPoseVelocity());
237        if (signal != null) setDriveSignal(signal);
238    }
239
240    public void waitForIdle() {
241        while (!Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted() && isBusy()) update();
242    }
243
244    public boolean isBusy() {
245        return trajectorySequenceRunner.isBusy();
246    }
247
248    public void setMode(DcMotor.RunMode runMode) {
249        for (DcMotorEx motor : motors) {
250            motor.setMode(runMode);
251        }
252    }
253
254    public void setZeroPowerBehavior(DcMotor.ZeroPowerBehavior zeroPowerBehavior) {
255        for (DcMotorEx motor : motors) {
256            motor.setZeroPowerBehavior(zeroPowerBehavior);
257        }
258    }
259
260    public void setPIDFCoefficients(DcMotor.RunMode runMode, PIDFCoefficients coefficients) {
261        PIDFCoefficients compensatedCoefficients = new PIDFCoefficients(
262            coefficients.p,
263            coefficients.i,
264            coefficients.d,
265            coefficients.f * 12 / batteryVoltageSensor.getVoltage()
266        );
267        for (DcMotorEx motor : motors) {
268            motor.setPIDFCoefficients(runMode, compensatedCoefficients);
269        }
270    }
271
272    public void setWeightedDrivePower(Pose2d drivePower) {
273        Pose2d vel = drivePower;
274
275        if (Math.abs(drivePower.getX()) + Math.abs(drivePower.getHeading()) > 1) {
276            // re-normalize the powers according to the weights
277            double denom =
278                VX_WEIGHT *
279                Math.abs(drivePower.getX()) +
280                OMEGA_WEIGHT *
281                Math.abs(drivePower.getHeading());
282
283            vel =
284                new Pose2d(VX_WEIGHT * drivePower.getX(), 0, OMEGA_WEIGHT * drivePower.getHeading())
285                    .div(denom);
286        }
287
288        setDrivePower(vel);
289    }
290
291    @NonNull
292    @Override
293    public List<Double> getWheelPositions() {
294        double leftSum = 0, rightSum = 0;
295        for (DcMotorEx leftMotor : leftMotors) {
296            leftSum +=
297                TankConstants.encoderTicksToInches(
298                    leftMotor.getCurrentPosition(),
299                    WHEEL_RADIUS,
300                    GEAR_RATIO,
301                    TICKS_PER_REV
302                );
303            for (DcMotorEx rightMotor : rightMotors) {
304                rightSum +=
305                    TankConstants.encoderTicksToInches(
306                        rightMotor.getCurrentPosition(),
307                        WHEEL_RADIUS,
308                        GEAR_RATIO,
309                        TICKS_PER_REV
310                    );
311            }
312        }
313        return Arrays.asList(leftSum / leftMotors.size(), rightSum / rightMotors.size());
314    }
315
316    public List<Double> getWheelVelocities() {
317        double leftSum = 0, rightSum = 0;
318        for (DcMotorEx leftMotor : leftMotors) {
319            leftSum +=
320                TankConstants.encoderTicksToInches(
321                    leftMotor.getVelocity(),
322                    WHEEL_RADIUS,
323                    GEAR_RATIO,
324                    TICKS_PER_REV
325                );
326        }
327        for (DcMotorEx rightMotor : rightMotors) {
328            rightSum +=
329                TankConstants.encoderTicksToInches(
330                    rightMotor.getVelocity(),
331                    WHEEL_RADIUS,
332                    GEAR_RATIO,
333                    TICKS_PER_REV
334                );
335        }
336        return Arrays.asList(leftSum / leftMotors.size(), rightSum / rightMotors.size());
337    }
338
339    @Override
340    public void setMotorPowers(double v, double v1) {
341        for (DcMotorEx leftMotor : leftMotors) {
342            leftMotor.setPower(v);
343        }
344        for (DcMotorEx rightMotor : rightMotors) {
345            rightMotor.setPower(v1);
346        }
347    }
348
349    @Override
350    public double getRawExternalHeading() {
351        return imu.getAngularOrientation().firstAngle;
352    }
353
354    @Override
355    public Double getExternalHeadingVelocity() {
356        // TODO: This must be changed to match your configuration
357        //                           | Z axis
358        //                           |
359        //     (Motor Port Side)     |   / X axis
360        //                       ____|__/____
361        //          Y axis     / *   | /    /|   (IO Side)
362        //          _________ /______|/    //      I2C
363        //                   /___________ //     Digital
364        //                  |____________|/      Analog
365        //
366        //                 (Servo Port Side)
367        //
368        // The positive x axis points toward the USB port(s)
369        //
370        // Adjust the axis rotation rate as necessary
371        // Rotate about the z axis is the default assuming your REV Hub/Control Hub is laying
372        // flat on a surface
373
374        return (double) imu.getAngularVelocity().zRotationRate;
375    }
376
377    public static TrajectoryVelocityConstraint getVelocityConstraint(
378        double maxVel,
379        double maxAngularVel,
380        double trackWidth
381    ) {
382        return new MinVelocityConstraint(
383            Arrays.asList(
384                new AngularVelocityConstraint(maxAngularVel),
385                new TankVelocityConstraint(maxVel, trackWidth)
386            )
387        );
388    }
389
390    public static TrajectoryAccelerationConstraint getAccelerationConstraint(double maxAccel) {
391        return new ProfileAccelerationConstraint(maxAccel);
392    }
393}
